      • add

        public final void add(Renderable renderable)
               throws OverflowException
        This method adds and positions a renderable in the line, if possible. Note that RLine does not set sizes, but only origins.
        Parameters:
        renderable - the renderable
        Throws:
        OverflowException - Thrown if the renderable overflows the line. All overflowing renderables are added to the exception.
